name: PC Gamer
content:
game:
  appid: 92500
  arch: win64
  prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
installer:
- task:
    app: dotnet35
    arch: win64
    description: Installing .NET 3.5
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: vcrun2010
    arch: win64
    description: Installing Visual C++ Runtime 2010
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: d3dx9_43
    arch: win64
    description: Installing DirectX9 D3D v43
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: d3dx11_43
    arch: win64
    description: Installing DirectX11 D3D v43
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: d3dcompiler_43
    arch: win64
    description: Installing DirectX11 D3D compiler v43
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: dotnet40
    arch: win64
    description: Installing .NET 4.0
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
